text: Boundary Peak is a mountain, (or peak), in the southwestern U.S. State of Nevada. The county is Esmeralda. It is the highest point in Nevada. It is less than two miles from the Cal/Nev state line, which is why it is called Boundary Peak. Boundary Peak is tall, and the closest town is Dyer, a famous ghost town. == Other websites == *Boundary Peak *Boundary Peak - Highest Point in Nevada Category:Geography of Nevada Category:Mountains of the United States
title: Boundary Peak
